translations: 预测，预言（prediction 复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Many of his predictions are coming true.
sentences.translation: 他的许多预言都在成为现实。

sentences.sentence: These results accord closely with our predictions.
sentences.translation: 这些结果和我们的预测相当一致。

sentences.sentence: Their predictions turned out to be wide of the mark.
sentences.translation: 他们的预测后来发现太离谱了。
